object.name: egyptian mace
object.description: A hierogylph-engraved mace has been left here.

extra_description.description: The mace is formed from solid brass, and engraved in strange hieroglyphs.

object.name: sand robes
object.description: Sand-colored robes lie here.

extra_description.description:
The robes are colored a sandy off-white, and are in fact caked and covered
                     |with sand as well.  You don't seem to be able to remove all of the sand, no
                     |matter how much you try.

object.name: obsidian dirk
object.description: A flat dirk made of chipped obsidian lies here.

extra_description.description: The blade of the dirk is black, glassy obsidian, chipped razor sharp.

object.name: cloth turban
object.description: A dirty cloth turban has been forgotten here.

extra_description.description:
The turban used to be white cloth, now it is covered with oil and dirt from
                     |the head and hair of its previous owner, who must not have bathed much.

object.name: cloth wrappings
object.description: Long cloth wrappings lie on the ground in a pile.

extra_description.description: The cloth wrappings are old, wrinkled, and stink of embalming fluid.

object.name: bottle fluid
object.description: A dusty bottle lies here on the ground.

extra_description.description: The bottle is dusty and the fluid has a strange sickly-sweet smell to it.

object.name: jar formaldehyde
object.description: A small jar lies here on the ground.

extra_description.description: The jar is sticky and smells really bad.

object.name: ball fire
object.short_descr: a small hot ball of fire
object.description: A little ball of fire hovers in the air before your eyes.

extra_description.description: The ball of fire is hot to the touch and very very bright.

object.name: stone scimitar
object.description: A curved scimitar made of stone rests on the ground.

extra_description.description:
The scimitar is formed from solid stone, chipped and carved to perfection,
                     |with a sharp, cold blade that is marred only by a few nicks here and there.

object.name: stone key
object.description: A stone key has been dropped here.

extra_description.description: The key is made from stone, but is otherwise unremarkable.

object.name: stone sarcophagus
object.description: A mighty stone sarcophagus lies in the center of the tomb.

extra_description.description:
The sarcophagus is engraved on the sides with the images of pharoahs,
                     |great wars fought long ago, mighty pyramids being constructed...
                     |
                     |A raised image atop the sarcophagus is formed in the visage of one of
                     |the mighty pharoahs, painted in gold and studded with precious gems.
                     |
                     |You see a small keyhole in the side of the sarcophagus.

object.name: dust
object.description: A small pile of dust is being scattered by the breeze.

extra_description.description:
The dust is old.  As you sift it through your hands you find tiny chips
                     |of aged bone inside -- it must be the ancient remains of something.

object.name: scarab
object.description: A small emerald scarab lies here on the ground.

extra_description.description:
The scarab is intricately detailed, down to the tiny hairs on its
                     |insectile legs and the faceting of the emeralds in its eyes.

object.name: lamp
object.description: A small, tarnished, battered lamp has been dropped here.

extra_description.description:
The lamp is quite old and tarnished.  You rub at it to get some of the
                     |grime off, but it doesn't seem like anybody is home.

object.name: ankh
object.description: A small brass ankh has been left here.

extra_description.description:
The ankh is a small brass symbol of an ancient religion.
                     |It glows with a soft bright light that is soothing to you.

object.name: book riddles
object.description: A medium-sized parchment book with well-worn pages lies here.

extra_description.description:
The book has well-worn pages, containing many befuddling riddles
                     |to surprise, confuse, and amuse you.  You find yourself bewildered
                     |by its contents and put it down to sort your head out.

object.name: lion paw
object.description: The mighty paw of a lion-like creature has been dropped here.

extra_description.description:
The massive paw has straps on it formed of bronze, so that it will
                     |fit snugly over your hand.  As you put it on, it melds with your hand,
                     |becoming an extension of your arm.

object.name: answer
object.description: A small piece of parchment covered in hieroglyphics lies here.

extra_description.description:
You cannot decipher the strange hieroglyphics that cover the
                     |sheet of parchment.

object.name: treasure
object.description: The massive treasure of the sphinx lies here in a big pile.

extra_description.description:
The treasure is incredibly large, filled with gold coins and valuables, more 
                     |wealth than you could ever possibly imagine accumulated in one place.

object.name: pile sand
object.description: You see a small pile of sand.

extra_description.description: You think you see some coins and valuables glinting amongst the grains of sand.

object.name: curse mummy
object.description: Some fortunate soul has escaped the mummy's curse, for now.

extra_description.description:
Rumor has it that whomever disturbs the grave of the mummy shall be 
                     |cursed for all eternity, and that the descendents of that person shall
                     |likewise be cursed for ten generations to follow.

object.name: small elixir
object.description: A small glass elixir lies under your feet.

extra_description.description:
The elixir is deceptively small.  Something tells you that its
                     |contents are truly quite potent.  Perhaps too potent for ordinary
                     |mortals to attempt to consume.

object.name: golden mask
object.description: A beautiful, intricately detailed mask has been forgotten here.

extra_description.description:
This beautiful mask was shaped from solid gold and magically enchanted
                     |to perfectly fit the face of any who choose to wear it, its golden features
                     |and turquoise highlights even moving to match the expressions of the face
                     |of the wearer.

Aha!
                     |
                     |You see a multifaceted gemstone, which strangely reflects no
                     |light, making it very hard to see when it lies on the ground.

object.name: sun wand
object.description: A small length of brass shines here with its own light.

extra_description.description:
This small brass shaft is a holy weapon used by the ancient people of 
                     |this land to defend against the deadliest of foes.  It shines with the 
                     |brilliant blazing light of the sun.

object.name: sandy ring
object.description: A small sandy-colored ring has been carelessly dropped here.

extra_description.description:
The ring is small, smooth, sandy-colored and unremarkable, save that
                     |it gives off a continuous low humming noise that tickles your fingertips.

object.name: golden sphinx
object.description: A small golden sphinx glints in the light.

extra_description.description:
The golden sphinx is incredibly detailed and very small, fitting easily
                     |into the palm of your hand.  You can even make out the expression
                     |of wisdom and peace on its face.

object.name: spinhxian leggings
object.description: Massive leggings formed from the body of a sphinx stand here.

extra_description.description:
These magically fashioned leggings impart the strength and stamina
                     |of the mightiest of the ancient sphinxes.  You feel ancient power 
                     |emanating from them; they seem to be almost alive.
